resources.string: There was nothing "mini" about the effort you put into getting this for me:
We\'ve shared a few days shredding the slopes…
Searing buffalo steaks and dipping fondues. We talked about life…
Sushi rolls and ice cream for two. We talked about work…
Actually, nobody knows what happened on our third date.
Your mom strode down the hall, shook my hand, and looked me in the eye. Your dad just wanted to talk about Notre Dame football.
You were far too nervous to meet my mom at Terragon.
You calling me in the night (Eastern time) to breathlessly announce you\'d won it all
Getting crushed by Shockwave, then surrendering to the Andy Dufresnes
Turning a corner, you hitting the game-winning RBI
Best not to talk about our softball experiment...
And of course, we\'ve followed our team through their ups and downs
